name: Solvecube
tagline: A fast Raspberry Pi and Arduino based Rubik's Cube solving robot.
body:
### SolveCube
The simplest method of solving a Rubik's Cube is to make random moves. While it may be fun to calculate how long that would take...

### Ways of Defining the Cube
### A Solution
### How to See in Color
The goal is the use a webcam and OpenCV to scan the cube. We first tried to use photocells and and RGB LED to scan the cube, but there were a number of problems. You can see what progress we did make at <https://github.com/jcoray/ColorSensor>. 


### Authors and Contributors
Created by Jakob Coray @jcoray and Gabriel Norris @Labyrinth-Maker.

### Support or Contact
Take a look at the README at <https://github.com/jcoray/SolveCube/blob/master/README.md> or shoot us an email.
